issue.title: `\yii\mongodb\rbac\MongoDbManager::getRolesByUser()` ignores defaultRoles
issue.body:
`\yii\mongodb\rbac\MongoDbManager::getRolesByUser()` ignores defaultRoles

### What steps will reproduce the problem?

- Configure RBAC manager as instance of `\yii\mongodb\rbac\MongoDbManager` with at least one default role.
- Invoke `\yii\mongodb\rbac\MongoDbManager::getRolesByUser()`

### What's expected?

Default roles returned.

### What do you get instead?

Default roles not present in results.

### Additional info

| Q                      | A
| ---------------------- | ---
| Yii version            | 2.0.10
| Yii MongoDB version    | 2.1.2
| MongoDB server version | *
| PHP version            | *
| Operating system       | *

Issue extracted from https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/issues/11230
